function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High energy usage from multiple electrical appliances","Impact":"Increased energy consumption and potential strain on the electrical grid","Mitigation":"Implement energy-efficient appliances, promote energy-saving habits, and consider renewable energy sources","Technologies":"Energy-efficient appliances, smart home energy management systems, renewable energy technologies","People":"Residents, utility companies, environmental agencies","Owner":"Residents, government, appliance manufacturers"},{"Description":"High population density and movement in the residence","Impact":"Greater risk of contagious disease spread due to close contact and interactions","Mitigation":"Implement social distancing measures, improve ventilation, and promote good hygiene practices","Technologies":"Smart occupancy sensors, air purifiers, ventilation systems","People":"Residents, visitors, service providers","Owner":"Residents, property managers, health authorities"},{"Description":"Large number of rooms in each zone of the residence","Impact":"Increased surface area for potential contamination and higher cleaning demands","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection, usage of antimicrobial materials, and implementation of cleaning schedules","Technologies":"Antimicrobial surfaces, cleaning robots, automated cleaning systems","People":"Cleaning staff, residents, visitors","Owner":"Property managers, cleaning service providers, technology companies"}]}
